Sentencas: A methodology, based on synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography measurements, is proposed to obtain 3D reconstructions of porous supports for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification

Sentencas: The methodology has been applied to investigate the microstructure of a typical Ni-8YSZ cermet substrate of an Anode Supported Cell (ASC).
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification

Sentencas: Experimental conditions have been optimised so that a 3D reconstruction of 42 mu m x 42 mu m x 105 mu m has been computed with a voxel size of 60 nm.
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification

Sentencas: The 3D reconstruction has been numerically analysed showing a quasi isotropy over the medium.
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification

Sentencas: A special attention has been paid to compute the morphological properties controlling the gas diffusion through the support.
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification

Sentencas: In this frame, it has been found that a volume as large as 35 mu m x 35 mu m x 35 mu m is required to be statistically representative for the whole substrate.
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification

Sentencas: More particularly, the tortuosity factor tau has been calculated on the basis of finite element simulations.
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification

Sentencas: The effect of the boundary conditions taken for these simulations has been investigated.
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification

Sentencas: In the direction perpendicular to the anode/electrolyte interface, the tortuosity factor has been determined to tau(z) = 2.8(-0.2)(+0.3).
Titulo: Characterisation of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Ni-8YSZ substrate by synchrotron X-ray nano-tomography: from 3D reconstruction to microstructure quantification
